import React, { useContext, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { AuthenticatedUser } from "../contexts/AuthenticatedUser.js" const Navbar = (props) => { const { authUser, setAuthUser } = useContext(AuthenticatedUser) const handleLogout = () => { setAuthUser({ username: null }) localStorage.setItem('user', '') localStorage.setItem('admin', false) window.location = "/#/" } useEffect(() => { let user = localStorage.getItem('user') let admin = localStorage.getItem('admin') setAuthUser({ username: user, admin: admin }) console.log(authUser) }, []) return (
